reviews.review_msg: She has a sense of humour but that's it. She's very strict, even tried hard on writing her papers, still gives bad grades, expect students reach upper-level writing standards. Do not know what I've learn from this class, she'll skip slides and cant follow up and unable to type notes. Avoid her if u can. GPA dropper

Decently clear grading requirements but tough grader. I found Perkins difficult to talk to and harsh in how she responded to myself. For a class that is supposed to be analytical it didn't much require much critical thinking in my opinion. When I did try to talk to Perkins in office hours she shut me down quickly and didn't seem interested.
